item.Q:
Write the character: jù
(jùliè de jù)
item.A:
traditional: 劇
drama; play; show; severe
剧烈 (劇烈) jùliè violent; acute; severe; fierce
zēngzhí appreciation (of a car, house etc); to increase in value
zēngjīa to raise; to increase
zēngduō to increase; to grow in number
zēngdà to enlarge; to amplify

traditional: 增強
zēngqiáng to increase; to strengthen
zēngshēng growth

traditional: 增產
zēngchǎn increase production

traditional: 增補
zēngbǔ to augment; to supplement; to add

traditional: 增設
zēngshè to add sth new

traditional: 增進
zēngjìn promote; enhance
zēngliàng incrementation

traditional: 增長
zēngzhǎng grow; increase

traditional: 增長率
zēngzhǎnglǜ growth rate

traditional: 增長速度
zēngchángsùdù rate of growth
zēnggāo heighten; raise up
gǎnjī appreciate
jīguāng laser
jīguāngqì laser

traditional: 激動
jīdòng to excite; to agitate; exciting
jīhuà to provoke
jīzēng rapidly increasing
jīqíng a strong emotion; passion; fervor

traditional: 激戰
jīzhàn fierce battle
jīhuó to activate
jīliú riptide; thrash (metal)

traditional: 激發
jīfā to arouse; to excite
jīqǐ arouse; excite; inflame

traditional: 激進
jījìn radical; extreme; extremist

traditional: 思維
sīwéi (line of) thought; thinking

traditional: 明治維新
Míngzhìwéixīn the Japanese Meiji restoration of 1868

traditional: 王國維
WángGuówéi Wang Guowei

traditional: 王維
WángWéi Wang Wei (701-761), Tang poet

traditional: 維修
wéixiū maintenance (of equipment); to protect and maintain

traditional: 維持
wéichí to keep; to maintain; to preserve

traditional: 維新
wéixīn a reformation; a political renewal

traditional: 維護
wéihù to defend; to safeguard; to protect; to uphold; to maintain

traditional: 大陸
dàlù continent; mainland (esp. of China); mainland China

traditional: 海軍陸戰隊
hǎijūnlùzhànduì marine corps; marines

traditional: 著陸
zhuólù landing; touchdown; to land; to touch down
zhùliù landing

traditional: 陸地
lùdì dry land (as opposed to the sea)

traditional: 陸續
lùxù in turn; successively; one after the other; bit by bit

traditional: 陸路
lùlù land route; to go by surface transport

traditional: 陸軍
lùjūn army

traditional: 陸遊
LùYóu Lu You (1125-1210), widely regarded as the greatest of the Southern Song poet

traditional: 東吳
DōngWú Eastern Wu (222-280 AD); the southern state of Wu during the Three Kingdoms period, founded by Sun Quan 孫權|孙权
dōngwú the Wu country in the Dynasty of Three Kingdoms
shuǐniú water buffalo
niúyóu butter

traditional: 牛車
niúchē oxcart

traditional: 牛馬
niúmǎ oxen and horses; beasts of burden

traditional: 黃牛
huángniú scalper
bùmáng there's no hurry; take one's time

traditional: 幫忙
bāngmáng help; give (lend) a hand; do a favor; do a good turn

traditional: 忙於
mángyú busy with

traditional: 連忙
liánmáng promptly; at once

traditional: 代名詞
dàimíngcí pronoun

traditional: 台詞
táicí an actor's lines; script

traditional: 名詞
míngcí noun

traditional: 單詞
dāncí word

traditional: 歌詞
gēcí song lyric; lyrics

traditional: 言詞
yáncí words; expression

traditional: 詞兒
cíér word

traditional: 詞句

traditional: 題詞
tící inscription; dedication

traditional: 劇作家
jùzuòjīa playwright

traditional: 劇團
jùtuán theatrical troupe

traditional: 劇場
jùchǎng theater

traditional: 劇情
jùqíng story line; plot

traditional: 劇本
jùběn script for play, opera, movie etc; screenplay

traditional: 劇目
jùmù play

traditional: 劇院
jùyuàn theater

traditional: 加劇
jīajù aggravate; intensify

traditional: 喜劇
xǐjù comedy

traditional: 戲劇
xìjù drama; play; theater

traditional: 歌劇
gējù opera

traditional: 歷史劇

traditional: 演劇
yǎnjù to perform a play

traditional: 編劇
